title: Student explanation for classmate failing grade

content.prompt: According to the fundamental attribution error, which of the following is most likely to be a student’s explanation for a classmate’s failing exam grade?

choices.label: The classmate was too lazy to study hard.
There were too many picky questions on the exam.
The classmate had no quiet place to study.

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
